tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BrandTrends (
  brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_name VARCHAR(255),
  trend_category VARCHAR(50),
  trend_description TEXT,
  consumer_preference VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE consumer_preferences (
    preference_id INT NOT NULL,
    consumer_id INT NOT NULL,
    preferred_brand VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sustainable_materials BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (preference_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consumer_id) REFERENCES fashion_brands(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consumer (
    consumer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_trend (
    trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    brand_id UUID,
    consumer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_brand FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Consumer (
    consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Purchase (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_consumer FOREIGN KEY (consumer_id) REFERENCES Consumer(consumer_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    brand_id INT,
    category VARCHAR,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Consumer (
    consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Purchase (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    consumer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT
);
